summary:
Cyber Resiliency and security solutions from OpenText result in fewer incidents, fewer fines, fewer penalties and less risk of breach for maximum brand trust and protection of customer data. Protect your systems, applications and data ensuring that only authorized users can access your systems. 

When I’m not helping clients, I enjoy movies and comics.

Connect with me here on LinkedIn and view the media below to learn more about how OpenText can help your organization make smart digital transformations.

✉️: ckeles@opentext.com
📞: +31611302365

Specialties: | Data Privacy | Data Security | Information Management & Governance

publications.name: Bescherm en bespaar – compliance wordt een opportunity

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Sales Leader with CyberRes, Micro Focus business unit, I help maintain relationships with our enterprise customers by adding value to their portfolios through a consultative approach for North and South Europe regions. I report to VP of International Data Privacy&Protection.

I help our customers save time, money, and resources by helping leverage the flexibility of our portfolio - adding resiliency by giving them the ability to overcome data loss and ransomware exposures.

With a broad software portfolio, backed by a deep inventory of advanced analytics that delivers insights, efficiencies, and automation, Micro Focus helps customers bridge existing and emerging technologies to safeguard their current business and expose new opportunities over the long run.

Combining pragmatism, agility, and customer-centric innovation to future-proof IT investments is what we’re all about. We deliver High Tech, Low Drama! 👍️

The most satisfying aspect of my position is having the opportunity to be involved in new scenarios on a daily basis. Sales is all about discovering new challenges and one day is never the same as another.

Our customers see us as a partner who understands their business needs and challenges. We’re a trusted advisor who is invested in ensuring their success by bringing valuable solutions.

🔐We implement, empower, and secure technology.

Check out the multimedia section below to learn how our customers are adapting to today’s evolving marketplace.

If you’re ready to begin your journey for Data Privacy, contact me today:

☎️+31(6) 1130-2365
✉️cumhur.keles@microfocus.com

Specialties: Information Management | Data Privacy | Data Security | Privacy Management
profile_positions.title: Senior Regional Sales Leader - Netherlands, Nordics, Greece and Turkey

profile_positions.description:
•	As Country Sales Responsible of Micro Focus Security, Risk & Governance products, built the Information Governance and Risk business from white space in Turkey & Greece. 
•	Defined strategies and built a strong sales pipeline in a short period by help of conducting more than 200 meetings to drive an engagement at the CXO level as well as with business units and IT/Information Security and Data Privacy units. 
•	Provided subject matter expertise on various applications of data governance, managing relationships between business units and IT under the effect of new regulations and foreseeing possible complications due to new changes.
•	Involved in our clients’ roadmap/IT strategy workshops for their digital transformation journey with some projects such as Data Privacy & Protection, Information Risk & Modernization and Preservation & Governance. 
•	Led the strategic partnership with various SI companies on GDPR related opportunities in Turkey & Greece.
profile_positions.title: Sales Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Acted as a trusted advisor for telecom, banking and energy/power clients as well as helped them drive new revenue, reduce costs and make better decisions by leveraging analytics, data management and visualization.
- Developed new business values ideas with clients that help them grow top line revenues, achieve higher Net Promoter Scores and realize higher customer loyalty through the use of state of the art predictive analytics.

- Built strong professional relationships with the customers. 
- Worked closely with regional SAS teams and local business partners. 
- Applied knowledge of company marketing goals and objectives, SAS applications, supported hardware platforms, marketing and business trends, and industry knowledge to assess account needs.
- Developed plans to identify accounts that have the potential for further development and executes them.
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
- Provide leadership and direction for RA and Credit Risk teams (5 FTE) maintaining engaged and motivated team through development, talent & performance plans.
- Own and evolve all aspects of RA and Credit Risk strategy to continue to develop and optimize team and business control framework that protects billing, revenue and cost.
Definition and implementation of the overall Revenue Assurance strategy (including roll-out of RA system.)
- Planning and budgeting for RA function (including managed services)
- Define and report against a set of KPI`s measuring RA operational performance across Enerjisa business for monthly management reporting.
- Ensuring that future risks from new technology and innovative products and services are understood and mitigated.
- Ensure major leakage issues are rapidly detected and acted upon (ensuring that RA processes are tied in with Enerjisa overall issue/incident management processes and escalation procedures).
- Ensure conscious business acceptance of risks and required mitigations, ensure fixes and solutions are delivered in timely and cost effective way.
- Represent Enerjisa in Industry (and as they develop) E.ON RA forums enabling development opportunities for our people and a clear view of RA best practices. 
- Set SMART objectives, review progress for direct reports.
- Part of Finance Leadership team work on cross team initiatives and big priorities. Support F&PS business transition / transformation needs towards efficient, high performance directorate.
profile_positions.title: Revenue Assurance Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for leading on multiple complex revenue (and cost) impacting issues protecting Vodafone Turkey’s bottom line and customer experience, ensuring that process, technology & system issues are understood, managed through to a full and permanent fix and that future reoccurrence is prevented.   
- Work closely with a range of cross functional expert teams within Vodafone Opcos, as well as external IT suppliers and specialist RA suppliers & partners.  
- Develop and implement Revenue Assurance policies & procedures manual
- Liaise with other departments, obtain, analyze and reconcile reports to ensure prevention of revenue leakage
- Develop prepare and analyze different Revenue Assurance reports
- Manage and supervise the revenue assurance staff by prioritizing and assigning workflow accuracy and ensure all revenue assurance requirements are met
- Conduct timely and effective performance reviews for all revenue assurance personnel
profile_positions.title: Revenue Assurance Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Manage a team to explore and actively pursue growth opportunities for Ernst&Young services.
- Achievement of growth revenue and profit targets through development of relationships and securing business with customers with broader national/european potential.
- Initiate and lead relationships with existing clients and targets. Build networks with cross service line's teams to better service our clients.
- Identify and share key EY knowledge thought leadership with accounts and targets via relationships.
- Planning customer activity and account management through application of the Business Development Process/Account management process.
- Negotiation of new contracts.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Manage periodic external financial audit support engagements for several insurance and manufacturing clients in Turkey.  Responsible for leading staff, reviewing work done, performing tests, coordinating communication with the client.
- Coordinate and performed journal entry testing and other analytical data mining procedures using Computer Assisted Audit Techniques (CAATs) in Turkey and Greece. Responsible for communicating with the financial audit team for identifying tests, preparing received data, writing ACL scripts and preparing analysis results and memorandum for the financial audit team. 
- Participate and/or manage several advisory projects such as IT Effectiveness Assessment, SOX project, Data Conversion Project, Internal Control Assessment, Test of SOX design and New design and Selection Processes of new ERP system for the client.
- Manage due diligence audit of information systems.
profile_positions.title: IT Risk&Assurance Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for overall business analysis of systems and processes
- Develop & administrate company standards and policies 
- Maintain close communications with the clients and be aware of their strategic goals and objectives, to provide direction, guidance and consultation on how current technology can best meet their goals and objectives.
profile_positions.title: Business&System Development Supervisor - vdf
